resources.string: You are strong, you know, in your own sort of way.
You believe in yourself, and that\'s what counts.
Each day is an opportunity to kind of do better.
At least you can learn from all of your mistakes.
There are probably good things coming your way.
There are opportunities everywhere, even though you don\'t see them.
You follow your heart, just like everyone else.
Things will unfold at precisely the right time probably.
You will be present in all the moments today, it\'s not like you have much else going on.
